product_name: Giro Air Attack Shield Bike Helmet - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With a removable eye shield and a sleek, compact design informed by wind-tunnel testing, the Air Attack Shield bike helmet is a highly aerodynamic helmet for all-around road riding.
short_description: With a removable eye shield and a sleek, compact design informed by wind-tunnel testing, the Air Attack Shield bike helmet is a highly aerodynamic helmet for all-around road riding.
